chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: This chapter describes the installation of P20 OIDC Extension into Oracle Access Manager.
The installation extends the provided application oam-server.ear with the developed module. For this reason, special care must be taken to keep this application operational.
The procedure for implementing the module is controlled by scripts that analyze the current state of the application in order to inform the person implementing the module about the necessary steps.
chapter.caution: The procedure must be strictly followed to prevent possible damage to the application.

section.title: Backup
section.para: The first step is to back up the current application so that you can restore the original state in case of any errors in the deployment process.
section.caution: Under no circumstances should the copy of the application created in this way be deleted.

section.title: Restore
section.para: Restoring the application requires that a copy of the application is found. This copy is usually created by the provided backup process. See Backup
